keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map s firstTab count=4
map cr closeTabsOnRight
unmap <c-e>
unmap <c-[>

map : LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map ; LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
map " LinkHints.activateMode action=copy-text

map / enterFindMode

unmap <C-d>
map <C-d> scrollPageDown
unmap <C-u>
map <C-u> scrollPageUp
searchEngines:
# This section can do so much more than search engines
# Directly search on whatever site you want
# I like to include a short and long version
# long version for steno keyboards
# short version for normal keyboards

# Stack overflow
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s StackOverflow
stack: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s StackOverflow

# wikipedia
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
wiki: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# Google search
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
Google: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google

# Google maps
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
Googlemaps: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps

# Open street maps
osm: https://www.openstreetmap.org/search?query=%s Open street maps
maps: https://www.openstreetmap.org/search?query=%s Open street maps

# YouTube
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube

# Amazon
az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon

# GitHub advanced search
GitHub: https://github.com/search?q=%s&type=code GitHub advanced search example search 'path: init.lua string.format' to search those files named init.lua for string format uses
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s&type=code GitHub advanced search example search 'path: init.lua string.format' to search those files named init.lua for string format uses

# powershell gallery
psg: https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages?q=%s
powershell: https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages?q=%s

# powershell documentation
psdoc: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/%s
powershelldoc: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.utility/%s

# nuget
nu: https://www.nuget.org/packages?q=%s
nuget: https://www.nuget.org/packages?q=%s

# ESP32 docs
esp: https://docs.espressif.com/projects/esp-idf/en/release-v5.3/esp32s3/search.html?q=%s&check_keywords=yes&area=default

# lua
lua: https://www.lua.org/manual/5.4/manual.html#pdf-%s
lua54: https://www.lua.org/manual/5.4/manual.html#pdf-%s
lua51: https://www.lua.org/manual/5.1/manual.html#pdf-%s

# git documentation
git: https://git-scm.com/search/results?search=%s&language=en
